thread.title: From WSJ.com: WSJD: Facebook Ignites Debate Over Third-Party Access to User Data

author: ComputerMagazine
title: From WSJ.com: WSJD: Facebook Ignites Debate Over Third-Party Access to User Data
text: Facebook Ignites Debate Over Third-Party Access to User Data From WSJ.com: WSJD: Facebook Ignites Debate Over Third-Party Access to User Data   Facebook ignited a firestorm over how it manages third-party access to its users’ information, after it said a firm with ties to the 2016 Trump campaign improperly kept data for years despite saying it had destroyed those records. This syndicated article brought to you by Computer Magazine from WSJ.com: WSJD. View the rest of the article at the original publisher's site here Your email address will not be published.
